name: mode_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off a specific mode of a SmartThings device without stopping the device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the mode.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to turn off the mode.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to turn off on the device.

parameters.name: predefinedMode
parameters.description: The predefined mode to turn off on the device.
